about.title: About the {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides powerful tools for managing metadata in {{ProgLang}}. It lets you read, update, delete, search, compare, and export metadata from files without needing extra software. Use the API to work with metadata in PDFs, Microsoft Office documents, Outlook emails, Visio diagrams, AutoCAD drawings, archives, and media files. Easily integrate flexible metadata features into any {{ProdShortName}} application.

more_features.title: Edit Metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{ProgLang}}
more_features.description: With {{ProdShortName}}, you can easily manage document metadata in your {{ProgLang}} apps. Add, change, search, or remove metadata programmatically.

feature_1.title: Simple Metadata Handling
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} lets you easily add, edit, or delete metadata fields in your {{ProgLang}} applications.

feature_2.title: Full Control Over Metadata
feature_2.content: Use the API to find, view, and modify hidden data stored in various business file formats.

feature_3.title: Use Built-in {{FileFormatUp}} Tags
feature_3.content: Access and work with existing metadata like EXIF tags in images, including info such as camera type, dimensions, or date taken.
